dist.hmm

Class SimpleStateDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.DiscreteDistribution
        • dist.hmm.SimpleStateDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distribution, StateDistribution, java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class SimpleStateDistribution
extends DiscreteDistribution
implements StateDistribution, Copyable
    A simple state functin doesn't look at the input observations at all when updating it's probabilities
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void estimate(double[][] expectations,
            DataSet observations)
        Description copied from interface: StateDistribution
        Match the given expectations and observations
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface StateDistribution
        Parameters:
        expectations - entry [k][j] is the probability of transitioning from this state to state j correpsonding to observation k, k can be seen as kind of like t all though it is not in practice since observations is many sequences glued together
        observations - the sequence of corresponding observations
